original_text: And Peter said to them, “Repent and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins, and you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
korean_text: 베드로가 이르되 너희가 회개하여 각각 예수 그리스도의 이름으로 세례를 받고 죄 사함을 받으라 그리하면 성령의 선물을 받으리니

sentences.original_text: and be baptized every one of you
in the name of Jesus Christ,
for the forgiveness of your sins,
and you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.”
